name: Indomethacin

ingredients.name: SODIUM STARCH GLYCOLATE TYPE A POTATO

indications: indomethacin capsules indicated : moderate severe rheumatoid arthritis including acute flares chronic disease moderate severe ankylosing spondylitis moderate severe osteoarthritis acute painful shoulder ( bursitis and/or tendinitis ) acute gouty arthritis
contraindications: lowest effective shortest duration consistent individual patient treatment goals . ( 2.1 ) moderate severe rheumatoid arthritis including acute flares chronic disease ; moderate severe ankylosing spondylitis ; moderate severe osteoarthritis indomethacin capsules 25 mg two three times day . ( 2.2 ) acute painful shoulder ( bursitis and/or tendinitis ) 75 150 mg daily 3 4 divided doses . ( 2.3 ) acute gouty arthritis indomethacin capsules 50 mg three times day . ( 2.4 )

indications_original:
Indomethacin capsules are indicated for:
                  
                     Moderate to severe rheumatoid arthritis including acute flares of chronic disease
                     Moderate to severe ankylosing spondylitis
                     Moderate to severe osteoarthritis
                     Acute painful shoulder (bursitis and/or tendinitis)
                     Acute gouty arthritis
contraindications_original: Use the lowest effective dosage for shortest duration consistent with individual patient treatment goals. ( 2.1 ) The dosage for moderate to severe rheumatoid arthritis including acute flares of chronic disease; moderate to severe ankylosing spondylitis; and moderate to severe osteoarthritis is indomethacin capsules 25 mg two or three times a day. ( 2.2 ) The dosage for acute painful shoulder (bursitis and/or tendinitis) is 75 to 150 mg daily in 3 or 4 divided doses. ( 2.3 ) The dosage for acute gouty arthritis is indomethacin capsules 50 mg three times a day. ( 2.4 )
warningsAndPrecautions_original:
Indomethacin capsules, USP are available containing either 25 mg of indomethacin, USP.
                  The 25 mg capsule is a size ‘3’ two piece opaque green hard gelatin capsule imprinted with ‘G406’ on the body and ‘G’ on the cap, filled with white to off-white granular powder. They are available as follows:
                  NDC: 70518-0254-00
                  PACKAGING: 30 in 1 BLISTER PACK
                  
                  Store at 20°C to 25°C (68°F to 77°F) [see USP Controlled Room Temperature].
                  Protect from light.
                  
                  Repackaged and Distributed By:
                  Remedy Repack, Inc.
                  625 Kolter Dr. Suite #4 Indiana, PA 1-724-465-8762
adverseReactions_original:
Indomethacin capsules are contraindicated in the following patients:
                  
                     Known hypersensitivity (e.g., anaphylactic reactions and serious skin reactions) to indomethacin or any components of the drug product
  
   [see Warnings and Precautions (
   
    5.7,
   
    5.9)]
  
   .
 
  
                     History of asthma, urticaria, or other allergic-type reactions after taking aspirin or other NSAIDs. Severe, sometimes fatal, anaphylactic reactions to NSAIDs have been reported in such patients
  
   [see Warnings and Precautions (
   
    5.7,
   
    5.8)]
  
   .
 
  
                     In the setting of coronary artery bypass graft (CABG) surgery
  
   [see Warnings and Precautions (
   
    5.1)].
